title: Practical Course on Utilizing Computer-Based Science Education Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Course for science education field practitioners conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Students can produce science education content optimized for mobile environments using open-source tools.
Students can design educational materials compatible with other platforms by applying XML-based standard formats.
Students can operate educational sessions in real-time online environments, considering cross-platform compatibility.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
